#326 0' 8.0"
225.19 lbs. 		Aries Pokémon Flairdries can see and influence dreams. Trainers who have befriended one wake up feeling lucky. Those with a more tenuous relationship wake up screaming.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Blaze 5 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
10 Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
25 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
40 Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
55 Dazzling 6 Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
70 Cotton Down 5 When hit by an attack, cotton fluff lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.
85 Drowsy Aura 6 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
100 Comatose 9 It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 46 Flare Boost 6 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
Disc 47 Frost Boost 6 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is frostbitten.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Air Lock 8 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Arena Lock 9 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
Bad Dreams 5 Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
Blaze 5 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Comatose 9 It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
Costar 4 When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
Cotton Down 5 When hit by an attack, cotton fluff lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Drowsy Aura 6 Contact with the Pokémon may put the attacker to sleep.
Effect Spore 7 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Filter 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Fur Coat 9 Halves the damage from physical moves.
Humidity Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a heat wave.
Hyper Cutter 2 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
Magma Surge 9 Turns the ground into Magma Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Regenerator 8 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
Scrappy 6 The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Steadfast 2 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
Tangled Feet 3 Raises evasiveness if the Pokémon is confused.
Unaware 7 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
Wimp Out 4 The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Dazzling 6 Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
Enchantress 8 The Pokémon creates a bizarre area that negates hold items when it enters battle.
Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Irradiated 5 The Pokémon generates a solar wind when it's hit by an attack.
Queenly Majesty 8 Its majesty pressures opposing Pokémon, making them unable to attack with priority moves.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
Aroma Veil 3 Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
Fairy Aura 9 Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Leaf Guard 4 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
Misty Surge 9 Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Natural Cure 7 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Pastel Veil 5 Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.
Pixilate 8 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Sweet Veil 5 Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.
Tangling Hair 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
